title: Cosmic Ordering: Sex Energy
description: Create your own power to manifest your desires through the transmutation of sexual energy. Cosmic Ordering: Sex Energy shows you how to improve the entire sexual system and increases the vibrations of sexual energy, making desired change in the realm of manifestation. Harnessing the unique sex energy that can only arise through sexual expression can awaken multidimensional awareness and provide you with your desired goal. For anybody looking to find candid sexual orientation and having a psyche preoccupied with engaging in sex play will find they are let down! On the other hand, that is not to say there is no sexual situations contained in this book, hence there is and keeping this in mind, it would be prudent to state that you are better keeping an open point of view than a closed one when reading this.
author: Stephen Richards
